posts.post_content:

Posted By: chainsmoker (9/27/2012 6:46:43 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: As said, it's not worth a second look past the Limited tables, but in Limited this is expensive but reasonable. Removal is still removal, and -3/-3 will kill quite a few creatures you care about. It's a shame this isn't a sorcery but you can still get good value out of this by using the buff to make their blocking choices awful, or killing their only blocker so you can swing in unopposed (and then it doesn't really matter it's not an instant).
posts.html:
As said, it's not worth a second look past the Limited tables, but in Limited this is expensive but reasonable. Removal is still removal, and -3/-3 will kill quite a few creatures you care about. posts.post_content: This is really good in draft. It's almost always a 2 for 1, and it's a REALLY good bomb for Rakdos. Splashing green for a 6 drop actually makes it easier to include. You get to shoot a dude and pump your [Rakdos Cackler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rakdos Cackler) to a 5/5 who will almost always trade or get chumped.
